HowItWorks.heading: How It Works
HowItWorks.subheading: With Kirana Jet, shopping in Hodal is as simple as sending a message. No apps, no queues ‚Äî just pure convenience delivered to your doorstep.

step1.title: Make Your List
step1.description: Write down everything you need ‚Äî groceries, stationery, or cleaning supplies. Even if it‚Äôs just one ‚Çπ10 item, we‚Äôve got you covered.

step2.title: Send via WhatsApp
step2.description: Just send your list to 9588 508 988 on WhatsApp. No app downloads, no logins ‚Äî fast, direct, and user-friendly.

step3.title: Fast Home Delivery
step3.description: We deliver directly from trusted Hodal stores in just 20‚Äì30 minutes. Fresh, fast, and hassle-free ‚Äî every time.

About.heading: About kiranajet
About.description: kiranajet is your trusted neighborhood shopping partner ‚Äî born out of the need to simplify daily shopping for residents of Hodal. We believe in bridging the gap between your favorite local stores and your doorstep through a familiar, easy-to-use platform ‚Äî WhatsApp.

mission.title: üöÄ Our Mission
mission.description: We aim to redefine how shopping is done in small towns by eliminating the need for apps, long queues, and big commitments. From a ‚Çπ10 item to a full grocery list ‚Äî KiranaJet delivers it all, straight from your trusted local vendors.

WhyChoose.subtext2: like never before. Here's why Hodal trusts us:

features.title: WhatsApp Ordering Made Easy
features.description: No complex apps needed ‚Äî just WhatsApp your list and we‚Äôll deliver it! Fast, simple, and user-friendly for Hodal residents.

features.title: Trusted Local Hodal Stores
features.description: We proudly serve Hodal by sourcing directly from your favorite local kirana stores ‚Äî ensuring freshness and authenticity in every order.

features.title: Fast Delivery ‚Äì Within 20 Minutes
features.description: We know Hodal's streets and shops like home. That‚Äôs why your essentials reach your doorstep in a flash ‚Äî with no hidden charges.

features.title: Wide Product Range for Every Home
features.description: From groceries to household items, KiranaJet covers all your daily needs in Hodal with care, quality, and convenience.

Review1.name: Rishi Raj Gupta
Review1.desc: Super smooth experience! I was able to place my entire grocery order through WhatsApp within minutes, and the delivery arrived faster than I expected. The team was responsive and polite, and the products were fresh and neatly packed. Highly satisfied with the service!

Review2.name: Meghna Sorout
Review2.desc: I was honestly surprised at how convenient it was to shop for all my household needs without even opening an app. Just a quick message and everything was taken care of! The delivery team was polite, and I got exactly what I ordered. Highly recommended for busy families.

Review3.name: Vanshika Bhardvaj
Review3.desc: Kirana Jet has made shopping from local shops so much easier.I no longer need to walk  around multiple stores to get what I need. Everything is just a message away. The best part is, they also keep you updated until your order arrives.

Review4.name: Sarthak Chauhan
Review4.desc: Affordable, reliable, and quick service . I placed an order late at night and still got a confirmation almost instantly. It‚Äôs great to see a platform so well integrated with local supply chains. I‚Äôll definitely be a regular customer

Review5.name: Anand Kumar Singh
Review5.desc: I was skeptical at first, but Kirana Jet really exceeded my expectations. The variety of items available is impressive and I love how you can support your neighborhood stores through this platform. Shopping feels personal again.

Review6.name: Neha Gupta
Review6.desc: Kirana Jet has made shopping from local shops so much easier.I no longer need to walk  around multiple stores to get what I need. Everything is just a message away. The best part is, they also keep you updated until your order arrives.

Review7.name: Diksha Shukla
Review7.desc: Very convenient service! Now I can order vegetables, groceries, and daily essentials from one place via WhatsApp. It saves me a lot of time, and delivery is always on time.

Review8.name: Kavita Sorout
Review8.desc: This platform has made my household shopping so much easier. No more going to the market for small items. It's a great way to support local shopkeepers too!

Review9.name: Manish Chauhan
Review9.desc: The service is fast and reliable. I ordered some snacks and groceries and received everything within 30 minutes. The team is polite and helpful too.

Review10.name: Kunal Shukla
Review10.desc: Kirana Jet is super easy to use. No need to download any app ‚Äî just send a message on WhatsApp and your order is done! The product quality is also very good.

Review11.name: Aditya Singh
Review11.desc: The best thing about this platform is that it sources items from your own city‚Äôs stores ‚Äî ensuring fast delivery and supporting local businesses at the same time.

Review12.name: Ruchi Bhardvaj
Review12.desc: I ordered home cleaning supplies and snacks, everything arrived correctly and the packaging was great. Placing an order on WhatsApp is super simple.
